about_the_game:
You loved Synthetik, mastered the gunplay and enjoyed the Updates we have been putting out for the game?
You want to go the extra mile with us and show your support? This may be for you!

The optional Synthetik Supporter Pack contains:

- The "P25 OVERDRIVE" starter Pistol

- Firetrail sparkling dash (no gameplay impact)

- Stand-out Global Chat Color & Lobby Name

- Wallpaper + Unit Cutouts to Print out

See you ingame : )



New: Compatible with Synthetik Arena & Combines with the Arena Supporter Pack for a upgraded Icon and Color!

name: SYNTHETIK - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3, Vista or higher
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 2.7 GHz / AMD FX 8320 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460, Radeon HD 5770, 768 MB Vram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3, Vista or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 3.6 GHz / AMD QC A8-7670K 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Synthetik Supporter Pack (DLC) Also compatible with Synthetik: Arena!
supported_languages: English, German, Russian, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
